name: NEIPv4Settings
desc: NEIPv4Settings contains the Internet Protocol version 4 (IPv4) settings of a IP layer network tunnel.

items.name: var addresses: [String]
items.desc: The IPv4 addresses to assign to the TUN interface.

items.name: var subnetMasks: [String]
items.desc: The IPv4 network masks to assign to the TUN interface.

items.name: var includedRoutes: [NEIPv4Route]?
items.desc: The routes that specify what IPv4 network traffic will be routed to the TUN interface.

items.name: var excludedRoutes: [NEIPv4Route]?
items.desc: The routes that specify what IPv4 network traffic will be routed to the primary physical interface.

items.name: class NEIPv4Route
items.desc: NEIPv4Route contains settings for an IPv4 route.
